Actions.Name: Sonic Screech
Actions.Effects: Characters gain +1 curse on saves until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Shriek
Actions.Description: All foes in range 2 must save or be forced to flee, shoving them 3 spaces in a direction of the Harpy's choice.

Actions.Name: Ear Splitting Song
Actions.Description: Foes in range 2 of the Harpy must save or become branded and lose all stances.

Actions.Name: Song of Deadly Soothing
Actions.Description: The Harpy gains aura 3. Foes that end their turn in the aura must save or become shoved as far as possible towards the harpy and pacified.
